psi.server

Interface PsiServer


  • public interface PsiServer
    Interface that provides the methods that perform the server-side computation of the PSI for all the supported algorithms. Instances of this class should be created by calling the methods in the PsiServerFactory class. All the input and output collections are devised to work on Strings in order to facilitate the data exchange between the parties and/or from external data sources. Thus, the conversion of the datasets to String is required and outside the scope of this sdk.

    • Method Detail

      • encryptDataset

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> encryptDataset(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> inputSet)
        Encrypts and returns the input element set. This should be called to encrypt the clear server dataset.
        Parameters:
        inputSet - set of elements to be encrypted by the server
        Returns:
        a Set containing the encrypted input dataset

      • encryptDatasetMap

        java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.lang.String> encryptDatasetMap(java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.lang.String> encryptedDatasetMap)
        Encrypts and returns the set of values contained into the input map. It is used to encrypt the client dataset, previously encrypted by the client itself. The keys of the map are identifiers that link together different evolutions of the same entries.
        Parameters:
        encryptedDatasetMap - a map which values must be encrypted by the server
        Returns:
        a Map where for each entry the key is the same as the input entry, and the value is a server-side encryption of the value from the input entry

      • getThreads

        int getThreads()

      • getServerSession

        PsiServerSession getServerSession()

      • getPsiCacheProvider

        PsiCacheProvider getPsiCacheProvider()

      • getServerKeyDescription

        PsiServerKeyDescription getServerKeyDescription()

      • getStatisticList

        java.util.List<psi.model.PsiPhaseStatistics> getStatisticList()
        Retrieves the statistics associated to the different phases of the PSI calculation performed by this object.
        Returns:
        a list containing a different PsiPhaseStatistics for each encryption phase

      • setConfiguration

        void setConfiguration(psi.model.PsiRuntimeConfiguration configuration)
        Configures the number of threads and the max lifetime of each thread used by the PsiServer.
        Parameters:
        configuration - containing the runtime configuration parameters
